biotools.summary: Tool which can be used to automatically or semi-automatically identify metabolites in complex biofluids from 2D NMR spectra. It is able to handle both 1H-1H total correlation spectroscopy (TOCSY) and 1H-13C heteronuclear single quantum correlation (HSQC) data.

bioschemas.name: MetaboMiner
bioschemas.summary: Tool which can be used to automatically or semi-automatically identify metabolites in complex biofluids from 2D NMR spectra. It is able to handle both 1H-1H total correlation spectroscopy (TOCSY) and 1H-13C heteronuclear single quantum correlation (HSQC) data.
